incidents.name: SMS/MMS Delivery Failures to Multiple US Networks from a Subset of Short Codes

incident_updates.body: SMS/MMS delivery was degraded for 19 minutes between 9:07 AM and 9:26 AM Pacific Time on December 6th, 2022. During this period, customers may have experienced SMS/MMS delivery failures when sending to multiple US networks from a subset of short codes. The issue has now been resolved.

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Airtel Network In Congo. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with SMS Delivery Delay To Airtel Network In Congo. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
